trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for an operation.
trans-unit.target: 定义可以用于修改为操作生成的代码的协定生成期间调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement the IOperationContractGenerationExtension interface on an operation behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: 在操作行为上实现 IOperationContractGenerationExtension 接口 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>类型) 以使你能够修改协定或终结点编译为代码时生成的代码。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，自定义<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>插入<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>在呼叫期间的集合</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>自定义操作行为</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可以修改协定生成过程之前的代码文档对象模型。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，自定义<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>插入<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>在呼叫期间的集合</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>自定义操作行为</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GenerateOperation method is called once for each contract.
trans-unit.target: 每个协定，GenerateOperation 方法被调用一次。

trans-unit.source: The working context that contains the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> types necessary to modify the generated operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含的工作上下文<xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref>需要修改生成的操作类型。
